page.title: 05BETHERSDEN RELIGION (2)
page.content: ST MARGARET'S PARISH CHURCH HAS AN ELECTORAL ROLL OF 92 AND THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF COMMUNICANTS EACH SUNDAY IS 35.THERE IS A SUNDAY SCHOOL OF ABOUT 25 CHILDREN MEETING ON SUNDAY MORNING. THE PARISH IS A JOINT BENEFICE WITH HIGH HALDEN. ROMAN CATHOLICS ARE SERVED BY A TRAVELLING MISSION CELEBRATING MASS MONTHLY IN ST MARGARET'S CHURCH WITH AN AVERAGE ATTENDANCE OF 35. THE BAPTIST COMMUNITY IS IN THE CARE OF A PASTOR LIVING IN A RECENTLY BUILT MANSE ADJACENT TO THE CHAPEL. ATTENDANCE AT THE WEEKLY SERVICE IS ABOUT 80 WITH 35 COMMUNICANTS AT THE MONTHLY SERVICE. THERE IS A SUNDAY SCHOOL. SERVICES AT THE METHODIST CHAPEL ARE CONDUCTED BY A CIRCUIT MINISTER.AVERAGE ATTENDANCE AT SUNDAY SERVICE IS 10.
